archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Microsoft Visio
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: A software application designed for creating diagrams, flowcharts, organizational charts, and other types of graphical representations. It provides a wide range of templates and drawing tools, enabling users to visualize, document, and share complex information and processes. It is commonly used in business environments for process mapping, IT architecture design, and in project management for visual communication of ideas and concepts.
